original_text: The spiritual body does not come first. No, what is human comes first. Then, after that, what is spiritual comes.
korean_text: 그러나 먼저는 신령한 사람이 아니요 육의 사람이요 그 다음에 신령한 사람이니라

sentences.original_text: The spiritual body does not come first.
No, what is human comes first.
Then, after that, what is spiritual comes.
